currentrevenue_summary:
As of the latest reporting, Adobe (ADBE) has reported the following financial figures:

### Quarterly Revenue
- **Q2 2025 Revenue**: $5.87 billion
  - **Reporting Period**: For the quarter ended May 2025
  - **Year-over-Year Growth**: 10.6% increase from $5.31 billion in Q2 2024
  - **Analyst Expectations**: Exceeded expectations by approximately 1.5% (analyst estimates were around $5.79 billion).

### Annual Revenue
- **Latest Annual Revenue**: For the fiscal year 2025, Adobe is projecting total revenue of approximately **$23.55 billion** (midpoint of guidance), which reflects an increase from previous guidance of $23.43 billion.

These figures indicate strong performance, with Adobe's revenue growth driven by its digital media and experience segments. The company also raised its full-year revenue guidance following the strong quarterly results.
guidance_revenue_summary:
Adobe (ADBE) has provided the following latest revenue guidance:

1. **Next Quarter (Q3 FY2025)**:
   - Revenue forecast: **$5.9 billion** (midpoint), which is approximately a **9.1% increase** year-over-year.

2. **Next Fiscal Year (FY2025)**:
   - Full-year revenue guidance: **$23.50 billion to $23.60 billion**, slightly raised from the previous range of $23.30 billion to $23.55 billion.

These figures reflect Adobe's strong performance and expectations for continued growth, particularly in its Digital Media and Digital Experience segments. The company is also projecting non-GAAP earnings per share for FY2025 to be between **$20.50 and $20.70**.

For further details, you can refer to the sources:
- [Yahoo Finance on Adobe's Q2 Results](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/adobe-nasdaq-adbe-beats-q2-203239289.html)
- [Yahoo Finance on Adobe's Revenue Guidance](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/adobe-reports-ai-fueled-earnings-210840474.html)

**Sources:**
- [Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/adobe-nasdaq-adbe-beats-q2-203239289.html)
- [Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/adobe-reports-ai-fueled-earnings-210840474.html)
gross_profit_summary:
As of the latest financial results for Adobe Inc. (ADBE):

### Quarterly Results (Q2 FY2025)
- **Gross Profit Margin**: 30.39%
- **Revenue**: $5.87 billion, which represents an 11% year-over-year growth.
- **Earnings Per Share (EPS)**: $5.06, exceeding analyst expectations.
- **Reporting Period**: Q2 FY2025 (ended May 2025).

### Annual Guidance
- **Projected Revenue for FY2025**: Between $23.5 billion and $23.6 billion, up from previous guidance of $23.3 billion to $23.55 billion.
- **Projected EPS for FY2025**: Between $20.50 and $20.70.

### Trends
- The revenue growth of 11% year-over-year in Q2 FY2025 indicates a strong performance, with the company achieving record revenue for a single quarter.
- The gross profit margin remains stable, reflecting effective cost management and operational efficiency.

For further details, you can refer to the [Adobe Q2 FY2025 earnings report](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/adobe-reports-record-revenue-q2-200500417.html).

**Sources:**
- [Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/adobe-reports-record-revenue-q2-200500417.html)
